entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 10:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High zero except 6 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero except 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 26 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
